name: NFL: New Faces in 2007 Quiz | NFL  by Season | 10 Questions

questions.text: After four seasons as a Chief, then seven in a Saints uniform, which wide receiver began 2007 as an Atlanta Falcon?
questions.explanation:
Joe Horn.

	In 2006 as a Saint, Joe caught 37 passes in the season with four touchdowns.

questions.text: After six seasons with the Ravens, this running back wore the uniform of the Cleveland Browns in 2007.  Who was this back who already rushed for 1000 yards five times?
questions.explanation:
Jamal Lewis.

	In 2006, the Ravens running back rushed for 1132 yards with nine touchdowns.  He also had 18 receptions in the season.  Lewis was a 2003 Pro Bowler.

questions.text: Running back Travis Henry rushed for over 1000 yards in 2006 for Tennessee.  Which uniform did he start the 2007 season with?
questions.explanation:
Denver.

	In three of Henry's prior seasons, he also reached the 1000-yard mark twice with the Bills.

questions.text: Starting his 10th season in the NFL, this quarterback had played for the Redskins, Rams, and Chiefs.  His 2007 uniform had a nice fit as a Dolphin.  Which quarterback was this?
questions.explanation:
Trent Green.

	After seven consecutive shining seasons, Green's 2006 marks didn't impress the Chiefs with a TD/Int ratio of 7-9, even after being selected to the Pro Bowl in 2005.

questions.text: A 2006 Colts running back said goodbye to Indianapolis, as another team would pick him up, but have to wait for the player's four-game suspension in 2007.  The team were the Raiders, and who was the running back?
questions.explanation:
Dominic Rhodes.

	Rhodes was entering his sixth NFL season, after reaching the 1000-yard plateau only one time.  In 2006, he rushed for 641 yards with a 3.4 average.  He also caught 36 passes in the season, and all from the arm of Peyton Manning.

questions.text: With the off-field issues of the Falcons Michael Vick, Atlanta obtained Joey Harrington to helm the team in 2007.  Which team did Joey come from in 2006?
questions.explanation:
Dolphins.

	Joey played in 11 games for Miami in 2006, and would begin his sixth season as a Falcon.  In his five previous seasons, Harrington would have a positive TD/Int ratio only one time.  That was as a Lion in 2004 when he went 19-12.

questions.text: The San Diego Chargers hired Norv Turner to be their head coach in 2007 to replace Marty Schottenheimer.  Which team did Norv have in 2005?
questions.explanation:
Oakland Raiders.

	Turner was head coach of the Redskins from 1994-2000.  Turner 'led' the Raiders to a 5-11 record in 2005.

questions.text: After playing five seasons in San Francisco, quarterback Jeff Garcia then played for three teams in three seasons.  2007 would show another change while suiting up for which team?
questions.explanation:
Tampa Bay Buccaneers.

	After leaving the 49ers, Jeff played for Cleveland, Detroit, and Philadelphia.  2007 was in hopes of being the number one man.  Jeff went to the Pro Bowl from 2000-2002.

questions.text: The Raiders added a great rookie quarterback for 2007, but had problems signing JaMarcus Russell, so added two more intially.  They obtained Dante Culpepper and which other 2006 backup Detroit Lion quarterback?
questions.explanation:
Josh McCown.

	McCown would play in his sixth season in the NFL in 2007.  He had played with the Arizona Cardinals in four seasons prior to that.  In Detroit, Josh took a backseat to Jon Kitna.

questions.text: Quarterback Tim Rattay played his NFL games in Tampa Bay in 2006, and as the usual backup quarterback.  Which team's uniform did he begin the 2007 season with?
questions.explanation:
Tennessee Titans.

	Tim had never thrown for more than 10 touchdowns in a season, and played in only four games with Tampa Bay in 2006.  He was brought to the Titans to back up quarterbacks Vince Young and Kerry Collins.
